title: Fairy Tale Chronicle: Kuuki Yomanai Isekai Life
original_name: フェアリーテイル・クロニクル 〜空気読まない異世界ライフ〜
sinopse:
A good-for-nothing man and a beautiful woman are caught up in a malicious glitch, and are sent into the game world, penniless and with only starting equipment.

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)
